lead_paragraph: BREUEL--Brian Harold, 71, of Princeton, New Jersey, passed away on May 29th, 2016 surrounded by his loving family. Brian attended the Lawrenceville School and Princeton University, where he received a degree in Politics in 1966. At Lawrenceville he was President of the Alumni Association and a Trustee. At Princeton he served as President of his Class and was on the Advisory Board of the Center for Human Values and the Princeton Prize in Race Relations. Brian received a JD from the University of Florida and was a published author in the field of Wealth Preservation which was his professional field. He was chairman of the Board of D&R Greenway Land Trust and served on the Dean's Advisory Council of Westminster College. He enjoyed sailing, scuba diving, traveling, reading, music and nature. During the last year of his life Brian faced multiple, profound health problems with courage, dignity and grace and was optimistic to the end. Brian was an extraordinary husband, father, grandfather, friend, and mentor. He will be missed. www.fluehr.com 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BREUEL, BRIAN HAROLD
